sqlMap.select: SELECT ORG_NODEID as orgNodeid, NUM_LEVELS as numLevels, LEVEL1_ID as level1Id, LEVEL1_TYPE as level1Type, LEVEL1_NAME as level1Name, LEVEL2_ID as level2Id, LEVEL2_TYPE as level2Type, LEVEL2_NAME as level2Name, LEVEL3_ID as level3Id, LEVEL3_TYPE as level3Type, LEVEL3_NAME as level3Name, LEVEL4_ID as level4Id, LEVEL4_TYPE as level4Type, LEVEL4_NAME as level4Name, LEVEL5_ID as level5Id, LEVEL5_TYPE as level5Type, LEVEL5_NAME as level5Name, LEVEL6_ID as level6Id, LEVEL6_TYPE as level6Type, LEVEL6_NAME as level6Name, LEVEL7_ID as level7Id, LEVEL7_TYPE as level7Type, LEVEL7_NAME as level7Name, CUSTOMERID as customerid FROM ORG_NODE_DIM WHERE level1_ID = #level1Id:NUMERIC# and (level2_ID = #level2Id:NUMERIC# or (level2_id is null and #level2Id:NUMERIC# is null)) and (level3_ID = #level3Id:NUMERIC# or (level3_id is null and #level3Id:NUMERIC# is null)) and (level4_ID = #level4Id:NUMERIC# or (level4_id is null and #level4Id:NUMERIC# is null)) and (level5_ID = #level5Id:NUMERIC# or (level5_id is null and #level5Id:NUMERIC# is null)) and (level6_ID = #level6Id:NUMERIC# or (level6_id is null and #level6Id:NUMERIC# is null)) and (level7_ID = #level7Id:NUMERIC# or (level7_id is null and #level7Id:NUMERIC# is null))
sqlMap.insert: INSERT INTO ORG_NODE_DIM ( ORG_NODEID, NUM_LEVELS, LEVEL1_ID, LEVEL1_TYPE, LEVEL1_NAME, LEVEL2_ID, LEVEL2_TYPE, LEVEL2_NAME, LEVEL3_ID, LEVEL3_TYPE, LEVEL3_NAME, LEVEL4_ID, LEVEL4_TYPE, LEVEL4_NAME, LEVEL5_ID, LEVEL5_TYPE, LEVEL5_NAME, LEVEL6_ID, LEVEL6_TYPE, LEVEL6_NAME, LEVEL7_ID, LEVEL7_TYPE, LEVEL7_NAME, CUSTOMERID ) VALUES ( #orgNodeid:NUMERIC#, #numLevels:NUMERIC#, #level1Id:NUMERIC#, #level1Type:VARCHAR#, #level1Name:VARCHAR#, #level2Id:NUMERIC#, #level2Type:VARCHAR#, #level2Name:VARCHAR#, #level3Id:NUMERIC#, #level3Type:VARCHAR#, #level3Name:VARCHAR#, #level4Id:NUMERIC#, #level4Type:VARCHAR#, #level4Name:VARCHAR#, #level5Id:NUMERIC#, #level5Type:VARCHAR#, #level5Name:VARCHAR#, #level6Id:NUMERIC#, #level6Type:VARCHAR#, #level6Name:VARCHAR#, #level7Id:NUMERIC#, #level7Type:VARCHAR#, #level7Name:VARCHAR#, #customerid:NUMERIC# )
sqlMap.update: UPDATE ORG_NODE_DIM SET NUM_LEVELS = #numLevels:NUMERIC#, LEVEL1_ID = #level1Id:NUMERIC#, LEVEL1_TYPE = #level1Type:VARCHAR#, LEVEL1_NAME = #level1Name:VARCHAR#, LEVEL2_ID = #level2Id:NUMERIC#, LEVEL2_TYPE = #level2Type:VARCHAR#, LEVEL2_NAME = #level2Name:VARCHAR#, LEVEL3_ID = #level3Id:NUMERIC#, LEVEL3_TYPE = #level3Type:VARCHAR#, LEVEL3_NAME = #level3Name:VARCHAR#, LEVEL4_ID = #level4Id:NUMERIC#, LEVEL4_TYPE = #level4Type:VARCHAR#, LEVEL4_NAME = #level4Name:VARCHAR#, LEVEL5_ID = #level5Id:NUMERIC#, LEVEL5_TYPE = #level5Type:VARCHAR#, LEVEL5_NAME = #level5Name:VARCHAR#, LEVEL6_ID = #level6Id:NUMERIC#, LEVEL6_TYPE = #level6Type:VARCHAR#, LEVEL6_NAME = #level6Name:VARCHAR#, LEVEL7_ID = #level7Id:NUMERIC#, LEVEL7_TYPE = #level7Type:VARCHAR#, LEVEL7_NAME = #level7Name:VARCHAR#, CUSTOMERID = #customerid:NUMERIC# WHERE ORG_NODEID = #orgNodeid:NUMERIC#
UPDATE ORG_NODE_DIM SET LEVEL1_TYPE = #level1Type:VARCHAR#, LEVEL1_NAME = #level1Name:VARCHAR# WHERE LEVEL1_ID = #level1Id:NUMERIC#
UPDATE ORG_NODE_DIM SET LEVEL2_TYPE = #level2Type:VARCHAR#, LEVEL2_NAME = #level2Name:VARCHAR# WHERE LEVEL2_ID = #level2Id:NUMERIC#
UPDATE ORG_NODE_DIM SET LEVEL3_TYPE = #level3Type:VARCHAR#, LEVEL3_NAME = #level3Name:VARCHAR# WHERE LEVEL3_ID = #level3Id:NUMERIC#
UPDATE ORG_NODE_DIM SET LEVEL4_TYPE = #level4Type:VARCHAR#, LEVEL4_NAME = #level4Name:VARCHAR# WHERE LEVEL4_ID = #level4Id:NUMERIC#
UPDATE ORG_NODE_DIM SET LEVEL5_TYPE = #level5Type:VARCHAR#, LEVEL5_NAME = #level5Name:VARCHAR# WHERE LEVEL5_ID = #level5Id:NUMERIC#
UPDATE ORG_NODE_DIM SET LEVEL6_TYPE = #level6Type:VARCHAR#, LEVEL6_NAME = #level6Name:VARCHAR# WHERE LEVEL6_ID = #level6Id:NUMERIC#
UPDATE ORG_NODE_DIM SET LEVEL7_TYPE = #level7Type:VARCHAR#, LEVEL7_NAME = #level7Name:VARCHAR# WHERE LEVEL7_ID = #level7Id:NUMERIC#
